page.title: 11The Garage ,Sandridge
page.content: Sandridge Garage is the only garage in Sandridge.They do no repairs there as the repair centre is at Bricket Wood Garage. Sandridge garage is open every day of the week, Monday to Saturday 8:00am till 6:00pm but on Sunday it is open from 8:30am until 3:30. One litre of 4 star in Sandridge costs 45.1p They sell Elf petrol and most of it is bought by regular customers. Each day roughly 300 people use the garage which sells about 20,000 litres of petrol a week. They sell on average 3 cars a week and most of them are bought by people outside Sandridge.
